text: "Kiss Me thru the Phone" is the second single off of American rapper Soulja Boy's second studio album iSouljaBoyTellem. The song was released on November 26, 2008. It features American singer Sammie. The song was able to make it to #47 on the Hot Rap Songs and #3 on the Billboard Hot 100 charts. It was also certified Platinum by Recorded Music NZ (RMNZ) and the British Phonographic Industry (BPI). The song is about Soulja Boy wanting to see a girl but he can't so he calls her so she can "kiss him through the phone". In the song, Sammie sings the phone number (678) 999-8212. When somebody in the United States phoned the number, it went to an automated message for Soulja Boy. A family in Greater Manchester was left confused and spammed with calls after fans called the number. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2008 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Soulja Boy songs
title: Kiss Me thru the Phone
